name: ComingSoon
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Listen to daily updates from your favorite movie and tv source. What is new and what is trending? find out today. here. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
